text:
Qualtim/Pushing7 (http://qualtim.com) | PHP/SQL Developer | Madison, WI | Full-Time | ONSITE

Skills: PHP, JavaScript, HTML

Pay Rate: Based on experience

Web development firm in Madison, WI, seeks an experienced PHP developer to further develop an existing program created by one of the firm’s lead developers. The program was created using CodeCharge Studio as the IDE hitting an MSSQL database. The ideal candidate excels at managing work, timelines and client expectations, and attending to detailed project requirements.

- 2 full-time-years-equivalence of PHP development (e.g., 4 years @ 50%, etc.)

- HTML/JavaScript (CSS a plus)

- Experience with MSSQL a plus

- Experience with Yes Software’s CodeCharge Studio a plus (we will train)

- Strong documentation skills

- Strong communication skills

- Strong teamwork skills

Shoot us an email via our contact form (http://qualtim.com/contact) if you’d like to get in touch.
